structure.unit: A AUTOMATED MOTOR VEHICLE REGISTRATION SYSTEM

law.catch_line: Owner may obtain updated certificate of title.
law.text: An owner who has obtained a certificate of title pursuant to this chapter may apply for and obtain an updated certificate, but shall not be required to periodically renew a certificate of title that has been issued to him.
law.history: Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 164, sec. 33, effective July 15, 1982.
